pli-tv-bu-vb-sk35:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk35:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjanti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk35:1.3: “Na thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk35:1.5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjati āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk35:1.11: parittake sese ekato saṅkaḍḍhitvā omadditvā bhuñjati,
